thread.title: CVS to stop 'photo-shopping' beauty product ads

title: CVS to stop 'photo-shopping' beauty product ads
text:
CVS to stop 'photo-shopping' beauty product ads Monday, January 15, 2018 - 01:14 
CVS Health on Monday announced it would no longer use digitally manipulated photographs of models to market its own brands of beauty products and would introduce a label informing customers which products may feature 'photo-shopped' models in marketing campaigns.   
CVS Health on Monday announced it would no longer use digitally manipulated photographs of models to market its own brands of beauty products and would introduce a label informing customers which products may feature 'photo-shopped' models in marketing campaigns.  //reut.rs/2DcIJjH
